plugins.prepareCmd: vsce pack -m "chore: publish version ${nextRelease.version} to marketplace" --no-yarn --no-git-tag-version --githubBranch main ${nextRelease.version} -o djpai.format-with-cli-${nextRelease.version}.vsix
plugins.publishCmd: vsce publish -m "chore: publish version ${nextRelease.version} to marketplace" --no-yarn --no-git-tag-version --githubBranch main -p $VSCE_PAT -i djpai.format-with-cli-${nextRelease.version}.vsix
